daily_summary.headline: Exciting Aurora and Space Launches Await!

top_events.title: Aurora Alert: G1 Storm Expected
top_events.description: A G1 geomagnetic storm is predicted, offering a good chance to see auroras at latitudes down to 60°.
top_events.action: Plan to observe the aurora if you're in a high-latitude area.

top_events.title: Falcon 9 Block 5 | Crew-12
top_events.description: SpaceX's Crew-12 mission is set to launch, carrying astronauts to the ISS.
top_events.action: Watch the live stream of this significant crewed mission.

top_events.title: Vulcan VC4S | USSF-87
top_events.description: United Launch Alliance's Vulcan rocket will launch a top-secret mission for the US Space Force.
top_events.action: Follow updates for this classified mission.

alerts.title: Aurora Alert: G1 Storm Expected
alerts.message: A G1 geomagnetic storm is predicted for February 5th, offering a good chance to see auroras at latitudes down to 60°.
alerts.action_required: Plan to observe the aurora if you're in a high-latitude area.

opportunities.recommendation: Good viewing opportunity for high-latitude observers. Worth checking if you're above 60° latitude and skies are clear.
Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
